name: VR Bird Glide
description:
VR Bird Glide is a game that you can glide in the world of VR as a bird.

Please attach a smartphone to the VR headset and play.
If you turn your head, the birds will tilt in the same way.

· Ring mode
Pass through the center of the ring that appears on the screen,
By gathering golden feathers, the world will spread one after another.

· Race mode
We compete with other birds at the beautiful VR world.
Take the feather and speed up.
Let's run through the top as you go through the ring.

· Collect mode
Let's collect the blue feathers dotted in the midwinter VR world.
Flying around freely, collecting feathers will add points.

Depending on your smartphone performance
It may not work properly.
